text: Hans Georg Mozart (1647 – 19 November 1719) was a German bricklayer of the Baroque period and master builder of the Augsburg Cathedral Chapter. The German historian Adolf Layer called him "one of the leading Baroque architects in Augsburg at the turn of the 17th and 18th centuries". He was the older brother of mason Franz Mozart (1649–1694) (great-grandfather of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart) and second son of David Mozart. title: Hans Georg Mozart
